alert.note: Alert for Attala; Holmes (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 17 at 5:45PM CDT until April 17 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN HOLMES AND SOUTHWESTERN ATTALA COUNTIES... At 545 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Bowling Green to Ebenezer, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Bowling Green around 550 PM CDT. Durant, Goodman and Pickens around 600 PM CDT. Possumneck around 605 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include West. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
